verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* beseech \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w gathering|strong="G1997"\w* \w together|strong="G1997"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w be|strong="G3366"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w easily|strong="G5030"\w* moved \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* sense, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w be|strong="G3366"\w* terrified, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* epistle, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* sent \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* hand.

\w Let|strong="G1818"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w deceive|strong="G1818"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* means, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w there|strong="G2596"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w a|strong="G1437"\w* revolt \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* sin \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* opposeth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* lifted \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* worshipped, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* sitteth \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, shewing \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w if|strong="G3748"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="G3421"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w when|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* withholdeth, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* iniquity \w already|strong="G2235"\w* worketh; \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w he|strong="G2193"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* holdeth, \w do|strong="G1096"\w* \w hold|strong="G2722"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w he|strong="G2193"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3319"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* wicked \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* destroy \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* brightness \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*, \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w working|strong="G1753"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lying|strong="G5579"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* seduction \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*; \w because|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*. Therefore \w God|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* send \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* operation \w of|strong="G0026"\w* error, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* believe lying:

\w That|strong="G4100"\w* \w all|strong="G3588"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* judged \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* truth, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* consented \w to|strong="G1519"\w* iniquity.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G3588"\w* ought \w to|strong="G2443"\w* give thanks \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w God|strong="G2106"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w for|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G3956"\w*, brethren, beloved \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w God|strong="G2106"\w*, \w for|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w God|strong="G2106"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="G2106"\w* \w you|strong="G3956"\w* firstfruits unto salvation, \w in|strong="G3956"\w* sanctification \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* spirit, \w and|strong="G3956"\w* \w faith|strong="G4100"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*:

Whereunto \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath called \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* gospel, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* purchasing \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* glory \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w*, brethren, stand fast; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hold \w the|strong="G3588"\w* traditions \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* learned, \w whether|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* word, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* epistle.

\w Now|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* Lord \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* Christ himself, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* God \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* Father, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* hath loved us, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath given us everlasting consolation, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* good hope \w in|strong="G2532"\w* grace,

Exhort \w your|strong="G0025"\w* hearts, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* confirm \w you|strong="G1325"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* word.
